Articles.Content:
Hi,

I've just upgraded to 1.0 and my ksp has got graphical glitches.

Here is a video showing the glitches:

abyteofcode.co.uk/imghost/kerbalglitch.mp4 

Any help?

thanks,

martin

This thread seems to deal with the same problems, have you tried this?:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100776-Terrain-textures-glitched-out](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100776-Terrain-textures-glitched-out)
